document_data.mainbody:
pple was a druid and slave of Baeloth Barrityl.
Apple fought with a spear and wore studded leather armor, including a helmet. She could cast some minor spells, such as cure light wounds and charm person or mammal.
Apple and her party were taken from a "shabby saloon" to the Black Pits. She was killed by the Champion of Baeloths Pits and their party in the Black Pits arena.
